text: Accident is a 1967 British drama movie. It was directed by Joseph Losey. The movie is based on the 1965 novel of the same name by Nicholas Mosley (who also stars). Other actors include Dirk Bogarde, Stanley Baker, Jacqueline Sassard, Michael York, Vivien Merchant, and Freddie Jones. It was distributed by London Independent Producers. At the 1967 Cannes Film Festival, it won the award for Grand Prix Sp√©cial du Jury. ==References== ==Other websites== *.
